titles.title: Unto Him Be Glory In The Church

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unto Him be glory in the Church Both now and evermore. Unto Him be glory in the Church Both now and evermore.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unto Him, unto Him, Unto Him, unto Him.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unto Him be glory in the Church, Both now and evermore.{/lang-eng}
